questions.question: What is Computer Vision?
questions.answer: This field of AI enables computers to interpret and understand the visual world.

questions.question: What is ImageNet?
questions.answer: This massive dataset of labeled images is famous for its use in training image recognition models.

questions.question: What are Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs)?
questions.answer: This technology allows AI to generate new images from text descriptions or other images.

questions.question: What is Object Detection?
questions.answer: This task involves detecting and locating objects within an image.

questions.question: What is Facial Recognition?
questions.answer: This challenge involves identifying specific individuals in images or video.
